message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your share is decreasing faster than mine, let's make this quick. 45/55 split?
I can still get more than 55%, 58-42 is the new deal!
This is getting us nowhere. Accept this offer, and we both walk away with something substantial.
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, 56-44 is the final deal!
